shop.society_trading.banker.description: Sells tools that help manage you money.
shop.society_trading.bard.description: Sells fun tools for music, photography, & custom paintings.
shop.society_trading.blacksmith.descript: Sells some metals, smithing templates, & geode processing tools.
shop.society_trading.cleric.description: Sells wands & Crystals of Regret for resetting skill trees.
shop.society_trading.exotic_trader.descr: Barters for Artisan Machine upgrades & other useful items.
shop.society_trading.farmer.description: Sells fertilizers, cooking supplies, & other farming equipment.
shop.society_trading.fisher.description: Sells Fishing Rods & upgrades, alongside diving equipment & tools.
shop.society_trading.leatherworker.descr: Sells leather equipment such as Backpacks & Saddles.
shop.society_trading.master_cultivator.d: Sells valuables crop seeds & fruit tree saplings.
shop.society_trading.mystical_botanist.d: Sells expensive late game items such as Furniture Catalogs & Sharestones.
shop.society_trading.shepherd.descriptio: Sells animal related equipment & some farm animal Spawn Crates.
shop.society_trading.bookseller.descript: Sells all kinds of Skill Books. Can only be called at the end of every season
shop.society_trading.market.description: Sells basic seeds & saplings depending on the season.
shop.society_trading.carpenter.descripti: Sells building blocks & seasonal furniture for constructing your farm.
